attributes.action: Instruct police to clamp down on motorway lane hogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would cut congestion, negating the need for the building of new lanes. It would also prevent accidents as it would force the culprits to pay attention to their surroudings whilst on the road.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
